page.title: 16ANDY HAMPERS CONTINUED.
page.content: Andy Hampers have two computers an Optin 200 and an Octopus,several printers and lots of screens.The big computer is linked to the Hull office. The holiday business is mostly for Americans who want to stay on farms or in country houses.The holidays are given star ratings and go up to five star,which is the best. There are 7200 agents all over the country helping to sell all these things and Andy Hampers do there own advertising in brochures,newspapers and on television. This year when we went to the offices we saw some new buildings being built to give them more space.They have some plans to sell other things next year as well, but this is a secret at the moment.
